org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.commit

Class ConflictHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.commit.ConflictHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommitHook

    public class ConflictHook
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommitHook
    This commit hook implementation is responsible for resolving conflicts. It does so by detecting the presence of conflict markers added by the Microkernel and delegating to a ThreeWayConflictHandler for resolving the conflicts.
    See Also:
    NodeStore.rebase(org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.spi.state.NodeBuilder)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConflictHook(ThreeWayConflictHandler conflictHandler)
      Create a new instance of the conflict hook using the passed conflict handler for resolving conflicts.
